ygData.subject: Re: Xegony
ygData.msgSnippet: As a lvl 35 DE cleric on Erollisi Marr I don t agree.. we heal the warriors of Innoruuk so they may harm our enemies... it s a basic cleric principle.. heal
ygData.messageBody:
As a lvl 35 DE cleric on Erollisi Marr I don't agree.. we heal the
warriors of Innoruuk so they may harm our enemies... it's a basic cleric
principle.. heal the tanks because they can do more damage than we can..
even 'good race' clerics know that.. (well those not trying to be a
wizard do).

All races need their medics and we are our races healers.. we promote
pain through extending the life of those more suited to causing pain..
our heals cause our enemies to hate us.. kinda apt really..

Dark Elf Clerics do make sense.. you just have to look at it the right
way.. Anyway we rock and look far better than any poncy good race
cleric..

Vinamin
Son of Innoruuk
Priest of The Lady
Erollisi Marr

Thorgerd Duskwind wrote:
>
> From: Thorgerd Duskwind <thorgerd@...>
>
> Heh... well, I'm on Erollisi Marr, but I'm one of
> those bad DE cleric types... won't be too helpful to
> ya, I'm afraid :P
>
> Are there any other DE clerics out there who are
> struggling a little with the duplicity of our natures?
> Evil, yet healing? Yeah, I know, I could take the
> notion that evil people are good to other evil people,
> but that seems almost like a cop out...
>
> Haith (Hathnobounds),
> Level 6 Dark Elf Cleric,
> Erollisi Marr
>
> --- Walt Zimbeck <wzimbeck@...> wrote:
> > From: "Walt Zimbeck" <wzimbeck@...>
> >
> > I agree with this for sure. Is there anyone on
> > Erollisi Marr?
> >
